title: [Sponsored Report] Naver Webtoon riding high on the Korean Wave
text: Naver Webtoon’s Line Webtoon and Line Manga are targeting the European market after seeing success in both Korea and North America. [NAVER] Saudi Arabian ambassador sends message to Korea Dunamu sets example with preemptive natural disaster relief efforts Oman Celebrates its 52nd National Day A message from the ambassador of Saudi Arabia to Korea Ambassador marks Singapore’s 55th National DayHoliday falls one day after 45th anniversary of relations with Korea Totalitarianism revived in the Democratic Party New parties struggle to offer alternative to PPP and DP U.S. expected to lengthen China exemptions for Korean chipmakers Women's basketball team reach semifinals as men punch ticket to quarterfinals Men's hockey team beat Oman to keep semifinal dream alive To write comments, please log in to one of the accounts.
